title: Vaara Lakshmi Haaram: Emerald & Diamond Grandeur
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Exquisite floral design diamond setting inspired by South Indian temple jewelry. Features a central emerald and a large pendant. Delicate South Sea pearl drops add a touch of traditional elegance. Intricate filigree work (కంఠాభరణం నగిషీ పని) enhances the overall aesthetic.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Also suitable for festive occasions and special family gatherings.
description: This Vaara Lakshmi Haaram is a timeless masterpiece that beautifully blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensure lasting brilliance and value. The Hyderabadi polish guarantees a rich, enduring luster. A statement piece that reflects sophistication and cultural heritage.
